did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Stanford University. Program in Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Program in Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity, honors theses
did.abstract: Honors theses written by undergraduate students in the Stanford University Program in Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Dept. of Special Collections & University Archives.

acqinfo.p: Materials were transferred to the Stanford University Archives by the Program in Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity in 2006. Additional theses were transferred to the Stanford University Archives from the Hume Writing Center in 2011.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creators for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Program in Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity, Senior Honors Theses (SC4-6531). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of honors theses written by undergraduate students in the Stanford University Program in Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity.
